I'm envisioning a [Damia, Sage of Stone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Damia, Sage of Stone) EDH deck with this, [Rite of Replication](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rite of Replication), [Clone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Clone), [Evil Twin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Evil Twin), [Infinite Reflection](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Infinite Reflection), [Phyrexian Metamorph](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Metamorph), and other clone variants to copy him, along with [Green Sun's Zenith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Green Sun's Zenith), [Chord of Calling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chord of Calling) and the like as tutors, along with [Ascetism](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ascetism) and [Vines of Vastwood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vines of Vastwood) for protection. Although it seems like it would be a failure and anti-synergistic in an EDH deck, the variety and flexibility of tutors and clone variants seem like it may work  
  
Kind of...
